item.title: Let's Kill This MacBook! - How to Mine Monero on a Mac
item.description: MacBook Pro 13 without TouchBar My good friend wants to kill his MacBook He’s already had it, the one in the picture above, for a couple of years, and the battery is starting to degrade. He has a decent budget for a new computer, but doesn’t want to buy a new laptop until this one stops functioning. We are going to destroy the MacBook by heat over the next few weeks.

item.title: About
item.description: Sabino Canyon, AZ Hi! My name is Nikolai Nekrutenko and I am a junior at State College Area High School. I am the president and co-founder of State High Model Aeronautics Club, SHMAC for short.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello World! Why did I make this website and what even is it? I’m glad you asked although you probably didn’t! I made and will continue to make this website because I want to learn how to build a website. I also enjoy writing, especially when it isn’t tied to a grade. I will be posting about everything from a small cryptocurrency mining operation that I run in the basement to my favorite hobby of RC flight to my own ice cream recipes and everything in between.
